name: Living Mandala
description:
Meditation experience. Control Mandala with your breath. Ludum Dare "Keep it alive" theme entry.

Art created via Inspirit from escapemotions.

Music Credits: https://freesound.org/people/Ephemeral_Rift/sounds/133484/

Controls:

[SPACE] - press and hold [SPACE] while making a breath in, release the button during breath out

[ESC] - pause/continue/stats

[Q] - quit

Author:

http://startunity3d.blogspot.com/
